description:
Riding knickers to avoid tan lines where you don't want them. With a female-specific chamois, these 3/4 length tights make saddle time a little more awesome. The fabric offers light compression with impressive stretch. Reflective patches on the legs keep you extra visible on the road, even in low-light conditions.

  • Flat waistband is smooth with a high back to prevents slippage
  • Female-specific KISS Air2 Donna dual-density chamois provides dampens vibrations and cushions your ride
  • Thermoflex fleece lined material helps keep you warm on chilly rides
  • Polyester Lycra® blend has light compression and a great range of motion
  • Body-mapped design provides a great fit in riding position
  • Reflective details
name: Castelli Velocissima Knicker - Women's
